borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of the installation of the Zero Emission MCS certified Air/Water Source Heat Pumps or Electric Boilers to be provided for space heating and hot water for the public house and restaurant use pursuant to condition 6; external sound level emitted from plant/ machinery/ equipment and mitigation measures pursuant to condition 10; anti-vibration measures pursuant to condition 11; the installation, operation, and maintenance of the odour abatement equipment and extract system, including the height of the extract duct and vertical discharge outlet, in accordance with Appendix 4G of the LBHF Planning Guidance Supplementary Planning Document - February 2018 pursuant to condition 14;  detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20 in plan, section and elevation and physical samples of external materials, including colours and finishes) of the replacement plant hereby approved and means of plant screening at roof level pursuant to condition 23 of planning permission ref: 2023/01867/FUL granted 8th March 2024.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
